The Dynamic Radio Sky Conference 2025

This conference is dedicated to the broad area of radio time domain astronomy, and reflects the advances in the field over the past several years, as we work towards the transformational capabilities of the SKA.

Date: 28 July-1 August, 2025

Location: University of Sydney

Topics:

  • Extragalactic synchrotron transients
  • Stellar radio emission
  • Galactic transients
  • Fast Radio Bursts
  • Active Galactic Nuclei and scintillation
  • Current and future surveys
  • Software and methods
  • Multi-wavelength synergies

The Dynamic Radio Sky Conference 2025
